37 namespace detail {
38 
39 template<class Archive>
40 struct archive_tag;
41 
42 template<class tag>
43 struct archive_helper {
44  template<class Base>
45  class BaseClass;
46  template<class Base, class Derived>
47  static BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(Derived &d);
48 
49  template<class Object>
50  class NameValuePair;
51  template<class Object>
52  static NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &d);
53 
54  template<class T>
55  class ArrayWrapper;
56  template<class T, class S>
57  static ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny=1, S nz=1);
58 
59  template<class Archive>
60  class StreamType;
61 };
62 
63 template<class Base, class Derived, class Archive>
64 typename archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(const Archive &, Derived &d) {
65  return archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template serialize_base<Base>(d);
66 }
67 
68 template<class Archive, class Object>
69 typename archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &d) {
70  return archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::make_nvp(name, d);
71 }
72 
73 template<class Archive, class T, class S>
74 typename archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::template ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny=1, S nz=1) {
75  return archive_helper<typename archive_tag<Archive>::type>::wrap_array(t, exact, nx, ny, nz);
76 }

120 template <>
121 struct archive_helper<boost_tag> {
122  template<class Base>
123  using BaseClass = Base &;
124  template<class Base, class Derived>
125  static BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(Derived &d) {
126  return boost::serialization::base_object<Base>(d);
127  }
128 
129  template<class Object>
130  using NameValuePair = const boost::serialization::nvp<Object>;
131  template<class Object>
132  static NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &obj) {
133  return boost::serialization::make_nvp(name, obj);
134  }
135 
136 #if BOOST_VERSION > 105500
137  template<class T>
138  using ArrayWrapper = const boost::serialization::array_wrapper<T>;
139 #else
140  template<class T>
141  using ArrayWrapper = const boost::serialization::array<T>;
142 #endif
143  template<class T, class S>
144  static ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny, S nz) {
145  return boost::serialization::make_array(t, nx*ny*nz);
146  }
147 };

188 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
189 struct ZfpParameters {
190  FieldCompressionMode mode = Uncompressed;
191  double rate = 8.;
192  int precision = 20;
193  double accuracy = 1e-20;
194 };
195 
196 template<typename T>
197 struct zfp_type_map {
198  static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_none;
199 };
200 
201 template<> struct zfp_type_map<int32_t> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_int32; };
202 template<> struct zfp_type_map<int64_t> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_int64; };
203 template<> struct zfp_type_map<float> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_float; };
204 template<> struct zfp_type_map<double> { static const zfp_type value = zfp_type_double; };
205 
206 template<zfp_type type>
207 bool compressZfp(buffer &compressed, const void *src, const Index dim[3], const ZfpParameters &param);
208 template<zfp_type type>
209 bool decompressZfp(void *dest, const buffer &compressed, const Index dim[3]);
210 #endif
211 
212 template<>
213 struct archive_helper<yas_tag> {
214  template <class Base>
215  using BaseClass = Base &;
216  template <class Base, class Derived>
217  static BaseClass<Base> serialize_base(Derived &d) {
218  return yas::base_object<Base>(d);
219  }
220 
221  template<class Object>
222  using NameValuePair = const Object &;
223  template<class Object>
224  static NameValuePair<Object> make_nvp(const char *name, Object &obj) {
225  //return YAS_OBJECT_NVP(name, obj);
226  return obj;
227  }
228 
229  template<class T>
230  struct ArrayWrapper {
231  typedef T value_type;
232  typedef T& reference;
233  T *m_begin, *m_end;
234  Index m_dim[3] = {0, 1, 1};
235  bool m_exact = true;
236 
237  ArrayWrapper(T *begin, T *end)
238  : m_begin(begin)
239  , m_end(end)
240  {}
241  T *begin() { return m_begin; }
242  const T *begin() const { return m_begin; }
243  T *end() { return m_end; }
244  const T *end() const { return m_end; }
245  bool empty() const { return m_end == m_begin; }
246  Index size() const { return (Index)(m_end - m_begin); }
247  T &operator[](size_t idx) { return *(m_begin+idx); }
248  const T &operator[](size_t idx) const { return *(m_begin+idx); }
249  void push_back(const T &) { assert("not supported" == 0); }
250  void resize(std::size_t sz) { if (size() != sz) { std::cerr << "requesting resize from " << size() << " to " << sz << std::endl; assert("not supported" == 0); } }
251  void setDimensions(size_t sx, size_t sy, size_t sz) {
252  m_dim[0] = (Index)sx;
253  m_dim[1] = (Index)sy;
254  m_dim[2] = (Index)sz;
255  }
256  void setExact(bool exact) {
257  m_exact = exact;
258  }
259 
260  template<class Archive>
261  void serialize(Archive &ar) const {
262  save(ar);
263  }
264  template<class Archive>
265  void serialize(Archive &ar) {
266  load(ar);
267  }
268  template<class Archive>
269  void load(Archive &ar) {
270  bool compress = false;
271  ar & compress;
272  if (compress) {
273  ar & m_dim[0] & m_dim[1] & m_dim[2];
274  buffer compressed;
275  ar & compressed;
276 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
277  Index dim[3];
278  for (int c=0; c<3; ++c)
279  dim[c] = m_dim[c]==1 ? 0 : m_dim[c];
280  decompressZfp<zfp_type_map<T>::value>(static_cast<void *>(m_begin), compressed, dim);
281 #endif
282  } else {
283  yas::detail::concepts::array::load<yas_flags>(ar, *this);
284  }
285  }
286  template<class Archive>
287  void save(Archive &ar) const {
288  bool compress = ar.compressionMode()!=Uncompressed && !m_exact;
289  //std::cerr << "ar.compressed()=" << compress << std::endl;
290  if (compress) {
291 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
292  ZfpParameters param;
293  param.mode = ar.compressionMode();
294  param.rate = ar.zfpRate();
295  param.precision = ar.zfpPrecision();
296  param.accuracy = ar.zfpAccuracy();
297  //std::cerr << "trying to compresss " << std::endl;
298  buffer compressed;
299  Index dim[3];
300  for (int c=0; c<3; ++c)
301  dim[c] = m_dim[c]==1 ? 0 : m_dim[c];
302  if (compressZfp<zfp_type_map<T>::value>(compressed, static_cast<const void *>(m_begin), dim, param)) {
303  ar & compress;
304  ar & m_dim[0] & m_dim[1] & m_dim[2];
305  ar & compressed;
306  } else {
307  std::cerr << "compression failed" << std::endl;
308  compress = false;
309  }
310 #else
311  compress = false;
312 #endif
313  }
314  if (!compress) {
315  ar & compress;
316  yas::detail::concepts::array::save<yas_flags>(ar, *this);
317  }
318  }
319  };
320 
321  template<class T, class S>
322  static ArrayWrapper<T> wrap_array(T *t, bool exact, S nx, S ny, S nz) {
323  ArrayWrapper<T> wrap(t, t+nx*ny*nz);
324  wrap.setExact(exact);
325  wrap.setDimensions(nx, ny, nz);
326  return wrap;
327  }
328 
329  template<class Archive>
330  using StreamType = typename ArchiveStreamType<Archive>::type;
331 };
332

340 extern template
341 bool V_COREEXPORT decompressZfp<zfp_type_float>(void *dest, const buffer &compressed, const Index dim[3]);
342 extern template
343 bool V_COREEXPORT decompressZfp<zfp_type_double>(void *dest, const buffer &compressed, const Index dim[3]);
344 #endif

346 #ifdef HAVE_ZFP
347 template<>

349 extern template
350 bool V_COREEXPORT compressZfp<zfp_type_int32>(buffer &compressed, const void *src, const Index dim[3], const ZfpParameters &param);
351 extern template

353 extern template
354 bool V_COREEXPORT compressZfp<zfp_type_float>(buffer &compressed, const void *src, const Index dim[3], const ZfpParameters &param);
355 extern template

403 //#define DEBUG_SERIALIZATION
404 #ifdef DEBUG_SERIALIZATION
405 template<class T>
406 inline const
407 boost::serialization::nvp<T> vistle_make_nvp(const char *name, T &t) {
408  std::cerr << "<" << name << ">" << std::endl;
409  return boost::serialization::make_nvp<T>(name, t);
410 }

413  vistle_make_nvp(name, (obj)); std::cerr << "</" << name << ">" << std::endl;
